remarks: Base set of scalar ring for the closed kernel dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdsbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdsbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsbase.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdsbase.l $e |- L = ( Base ` F ) $.
lcdsbase.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsbase.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcdsbase.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lcdsbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdsbase $p |- ( ph -> R = L ) $.
